ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 689
ygData.msgSnippet: ... At least you pay attention to your list.  Alot of yahoo lists get abandoned, the owner disappears and no one can ever do maintenance stuff.
ygData.messageBody:
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 24
> Date: Wed, 19 Feb 2003 19:35:33 -0600
> From: "Su" <suceress@...>
> Subject: OT: Lyrist put to No Email
>
> Since that Lyrist thing kept spamming people everytime they posted I put the
> account it was associated with on No Email.
> I tried to email the person to inform them of this but only got one of those
> annoying automated responses.
> Hopefully the problem will stop now that they are no longer being sent
> messages.
> luv,
> -Su (list owner)
>
>
>
At least you pay attention to your list. Alot of yahoo lists get
abandoned, the owner disappears and no one can ever do maintenance stuff.
